reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Support for the textile chain in the creation of economic and employment opportunities in Jordan

description.narrative: Interventi di supporto alle attività tessili che favoriscano lo sviluppo economico e incrementi l’occupazione in Giordania. Verranno attivati corsi e attività che mirino a sviluppare le attività creative e imprenditoriali nell’ambito dell’industria tessile inserendo la Giordania nel circuito internazionale della moda.

Measures to support textile activities which promote economic development and increase employment in Jordan. There will be courses and activities aimed at developing creative and entrepreneurial activities within the textile industry by including Jordan in the international fashion circuit

UNIDO - ORGANIZZAZIONE DELLE NAZIONI UNITE PER LO SVILUPPO INDUSTRIALE

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors
Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
